attributes.title: Don't download
attributes.review: Why is this even available. Worst app ever! Thought i would download it to see whats going up with the upcoming elections yet got a freaking virus on my phone shutting all apps and restarting my phone! Because of this app now my phone keeps restarting and this is my 5th attempt to write this review. Just take it down

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is the most informative app ever.... if I was a moron 🧚🏻✨.To start off I tried downloading this app in March and it just finished downloading. This app started tracking my ever move and I almost got kidnapped because of it. It leaks your information to China and I’m not talking China from A.N.T farm im talking THE China. Would not recommend, if I could give this zero stars I would.

attributes.title: Completely terrible
attributes.review: This app would get 0 stars if possible. It is beyond awful and takes forever to do anything. Also it asks for personal information which I find in inappropriate. This app needs to be taken off the App Store before anyone else has to suffer through it’s terrible features.

attributes.title: Potatoes
attributes.review: This app kept telling me it would send me potatoes in the mail, and I clicked for the most orange one, considering it was fitting, but it was never sent to me😤I am beyond disappointed. I love potatoes🥰😍BUT NOW I DONT HAVE ONE. I am so upset, and this app made me cry myself to sleep for weeks on end, and then I would get really angry. And then cry myself to sleep again😜I really did not enjoy this app😫👎

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: I just wanted to see my favorite orange cheeto, but this time, in app form. 🥵🥰 But to no one’s surprise, it took up all of the storage on my phone! 😭I was forced to delete all of my precious childhood photos in order to keep this app. 💔 I just wanted to support our totally not racist president. Take this off the app store so no one else runs into my problem!! 😡

attributes.title: got me killed..
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and right when i got it, donald duck- i meant trump, showed up right in front of me.. 😧 his breath stank very bad and ended up giving me a heart attack. beware if you are downloading this app, it is very dangerous and i do not recommend. i also don’t recommend voting him for president bc there is so much wrong w him :) BIDEN 2020 💙💙 also trump has a small 🍤

This app honestly is the absolute worst thing i’ve ever managed to download. Not too sure what possessed me when i thought it might be a good idea to get this monstrosity. It took 2 weeks to fully instal on my iphone and right after it did all it did was show me pictures of an old, shriveled up cheeto..? Whoever designed this app needs to be fired ASAP.

attributes.title: Horrible! Virus! Now a Democrat! Frick trump!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a Republican hopefully making a America great again and once it FINALLY downloaded it (it took hours) the app hacked into my data and erased everything! I HAVE RIGHTS it was like a Trojan horse came in disguise to my beliefs and ruined my phone I will now proudly say this app changed my views and turned me into an evolved human whom thinks for themselves! A proud DEMOCRAT!

attributes.title: Warning!!! Bugs!!!
attributes.review: A few days after entering my email and phone number, my email account was hacked and my phone started glitching. When I try to delete the app it doesn’t leave my home screen and whats even worse is the all doesn’t even work so I can’t even use it. Worst download of my life
